title: Of Mice and Machetes
abstract:
Let $R$ be the class of regular cardinals which are not hyperinaccessible. We
show that $L[R]$, and similar inner models in the $\alpha$-inaccessible
hierarchy, can be generated by iterating a small "machete" mouse up through all
the ordinals, and then taking a generic extension by a hyperclass Magidor
iteration of Prikry forcings. We then show that such simple mice are themselves
elements of $L[\mathsf{Reg}]$.
